About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Hi! My name is Nick Bohannan. I have three years of experience in the following technologies: Node.js, numerous SQL dialects, Python, C# (.Net Core), React Framework, HTML, and CSS. My specialty is backend/API development with much of that experience in the healthcare IT world. I am available for backend and API buildouts and anything server-side as well as fullstack (back-end and front-end) web development projects. Check the My Work section to see my projects and code on Github. Please see the How to Reach Me section to contact me. Thanks for visiting!

PAL Health Technologies/Reditus Labs

Software Developer/IT Co-manager

Developed COVID-19 polymerase chain reaction machine interface that processed hundreds of thousands of patients at time of departure. Developed online portal for real time orthotic manufacturing tracking for client physicians. Other projects: eAlert system, security system using raspberry pi and python, among others.

Bohannan Medical Distributors

IT Manager/Service Associate

Manage the ecommerce website and inventory database as well as consult with patients and physicians on proper use of orthopedic home medical equipment. Microsoft Sharepoint, MS Office Suite, GIMP (open source photoshop-like program), Wordpress CMS, HTML, CSS, and a little PHP.

AlignLife Work and Wellness

Director of Operations

Managed an online wellness platform aimed at increasing the health and job performance of employees of client companies. HTML, CSS, Javascript.
